author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
How did Jamie reaction to seeing clips of Adam making jokes about him on MythBusters? Why didn't MythBusters do more horror-movie myths on the show, like from Saw or Final Destination? Is prop-making a good business for a middle-aged professional to move into? In this live stream excerpt, Adam answers these questions from Tested members MobSpiderVA and ChrisMakesProps, whom we thank for their support! What horror-movie myth would you have wanted to see on MythBusters?

00:00 Jamie jokes
01:55 Horror movie myths
03:35 Making props as a business
More MythBusters-related videos: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TSsoa9XBwGs&list=PLJtitKU0CAehaZdgrPRzjyGFSEQ8URiQl

Tested and Adam Savage Ts, stickers, (de) merit ba
title: Did Jamie Mind Adam's Jokes About Him on MythBusters?
